name: ich_splits_wide_char
description: ICH at the continuation cell of a wide char should clean up the wide char head and insert blank
comment: Print A, 中 (wide: cols 1-2), BC. CUP(1,3) → cursor at (0,2) the continuation cell. ICH 1 inserts blank at (0,2), shifts remaining right. The wide char head at (0,1) is cleaned up because its pair was broken.
